segments.text: From my view, the kitchen looks busy and lived-in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on her task, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the sink pouring water over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a waterfall right there on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in the growing flood, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy is on a stool, arm in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies, plate in the other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool sways backward, oh no!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches, hand up, expecting her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating in this sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage is happening, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, so out of place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such hazards in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end badly for everyone involved.
segments.speaker: PAR
